description: 859 Other Business Services not Elsewhere Specified
extraDescription: The Integrity Services National Committee (InSNC) is looking to develop a new governance structure and establish clear priorities and strategic direction. Contracting firm will provide expert assistance in reviewing current governance structure, identify issues and challenges, and develop recommended option for moving forward. The governance review and priority setting exercise would be used to inspire strategic decision making and to focus limited resources on priority activities that would drive the Branch and the Integrity business line to its preferred future while at the same time delivering on current priorities.
